column2: "Levifo Asɔfo nye Levi ebusuakuw nyinara rinnya kyɛfa nye egyapadze wɔ Israel mu: EWURADZE ogya afɔr nye n'egyapadze na wondzi."
"Na worinnya egyapadze wɔ hɔn nuanom mu: EWURADZE nye hɔn egyapadze
column3: dɛ mbrɛ ɔaka akyerɛ hɔn no."

column2: "Na iyi nyɛ asɔfo no hɔn ndzinoa mfi ɔman no hɔ
column3: mfi hɔn a wɔbɔ afɔr no hɔ
column8: nye efur no mma ɔsɔfo no."

column2: "W'eburow
column5: nye wo nguan ho nhwi a woesusua no kan no

column2: "Osiandɛ ɔno na EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn asan mu eyi no wɔ w'ebusuakuw nyinara mu
column3: dɛ ongyina nsom wɔ EWURADZE ne dzin mu
column4: ɔno na ne mbabanyin daa nyina."

column2: "Na sɛ Levinyi bi fi wo nkuropon no biara mu
column3: fi Israel mu beebiara mbrɛ ɔakɔsoɛ
column4: na ɔdze ne kra ne pɛ nyinara ba beebi mbrɛ EWURADZE asan mu eyi no a;"

column2: "ɔno ɔnsom wɔ EWURADZE ne Nyankopɔn ne dzin mu
column3: dɛ mbrɛ no nuanom Levifo no a wogyina EWURADZE enyim hɔ no nyinara yɛ no."

column2: "Wonnya kyɛfa dɛ hɔndze no ndzi
column3: mfa nka dza ofi n'egyanom adzetɔn mu ba no ho."

column2: "Sɛ inya du asaase a EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn dze rema wo no do a
column3: mma nnsua amanaman no hɔn ndzeyɛɛ a ɔyɛ ekyiwadze no yɛ."

column2: "Mma wonnhu wo mu obi a ɔma ne babanyin anaa ne babaa fa ogya mu
"Osiandɛ obiara a ɔyɛ iyinom no yɛ ekyiwadze ma EWURADZE: na osian ekyiwadze yi ntsi na EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn tutuu hɔn fii w'enyim yi."
"Enye EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn ntsena no emudzi mu."
"Na amanaman yi a erekɛfa yi wotsie hɔn a wɔyɛ abayidze
column4: EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn mmaa wo kwan dɛ yɛ dɛm."

column2: "Nkɔnhyɛnyi a ofi wo mu
column3: ofi wo nuanom mu a ɔtse dɛ emi
column4: na EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn bɛma no do ama wo; ɔno na hom ntsie no;"

column2: "dɛ mbrɛ dza ibisae wɔ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn hɔ wɔ Horeb
column3: wɔ nguabɔ da no tse nyinara
column5: Mma menntse EWURADZE me Nyankopɔn ndze bio
column6: nkyii so mma munnhu ogya kɛse yi bio

column2: "Na EWURADZE see me dɛ
"Mebɛma nkɔnhyɛnyi do ama hɔn wɔ hɔn nuanom mu tse dɛ ɔwo; na medze me nsɛm bɛhyɛ n'anomu
column3: na ɔaka dza mebɛhyɛ no nyinara akyerɛ hɔn."

column2: "Na ɔbɛba dɛ obiara a onnketsie me nsɛm a ɔbɛka wɔ me dzin mu no
"Na nkɔnhyɛnyi a ɔbɛka asɛm bi nkontompɔ mu wɔ me dzin mu a
column4: anaa nyia ɔbɛkasa wɔ enyame fofor bi dzin mu no

column2: "Bi a nna ase wɔ w'akoma mu dɛ
column3: Yɛbɛyɛ dɛn bohu asɛm a EWURADZE nnkae no?"

column2: "Ɔno nye dɛ
column3: sɛ nkɔnhyɛnyi bi kasa wɔ EWURADZE ne dzin mu
column4: na sɛ asɛm no annyɛ hɔ anaa ammba mu so a
column5: nna asɛm a EWURADZE nnkae no nye no: nkɔnhyɛnyi no aka no ator mu
